pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Jeff Karstens; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .225 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .307 off him after that.
Jeff Karstens is still attacking Yadier Molina with the sinker even though Molina hit one for a double last time up.
